# Adswerve, Inc. - Company and Product Overview

## General Information about Adswerve, Inc.
Adswerve, Inc. is a data, media, and technology consultancy based in Denver, Colorado. The company specializes in providing innovative digital marketing solutions and is recognized as an Adobe Gold partner. As of early 2024, Adswerve employs approximately 300 team members who work remotely from various locations, including the US, Canada, South Africa, and Europe [(Join Us | Culture | Adswerve by Adswerve Inc, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/join-us/culture). The company has been actively expanding its capabilities through strategic acquisitions, including the recent acquisition of MiaProva, which enhances its digital marketing offerings and testing capabilities [(Adswerve Acquires MiaProva to Expand Digital Marketing Offerings and Enhance Testing Capabilities, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/press-releases/adswerve-acquires-miaprova-to-expand-digital-marketing-offerings-and-enhance-testing-capabilities).

## Recent Acquisitions and Partnerships
Adswerve's acquisition of MiaProva on January 23, 2024, marks a significant step in enhancing its digital marketing capabilities. MiaProva is known for its expertise in Adobe Target and Adobe Analytics, and its proprietary technologies are expected to bolster Adswerve's position as a leading digital consultancy [(Adswerve Acquires MiaProva to Expand Digital Marketing Offerings and Enhance Testing Capabilities, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/press-releases/adswerve-acquires-miaprova-to-expand-digital-marketing-offerings-and-enhance-testing-capabilities). This acquisition follows previous mergers with Metric Partners Consulting in 2022, LiquidBox in 2021, and Analytics Pros in 2018, indicating a consistent strategy of growth through acquisition [(Adswerve Acquires MiaProva to Expand Digital Marketing Offerings and Enhance Testing Capabilities, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/press-releases/adswerve-acquires-miaprova-to-expand-digital-marketing-offerings-and-enhance-testing-capabilities).

## Fundraising Events and Financial Performance
While specific fundraising events were not detailed in the articles, Adswerve's recognition as the 2024 Adobe Digital Experience Emerging Partner of the Year highlights its significant growth and success in the digital marketing space. This accolade reflects the company's commitment to delivering innovative solutions and maximizing customer interactions through data and analytics [(Adswerve Named 2024 Adobe Digital Experience Emerging Partner of the Year – Americas, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/press-releases/adswerve-named-2024-adobe-digital-experience-emerging-partner-of-the-year-americas).

## Product Development and Innovations
Adswerve's primary product offerings include advanced digital marketing solutions that leverage Adobe and Google technologies. The company focuses on optimizing customer journeys through tools like Adobe Customer Journey Analytics and Google Marketing Platform. Recent developments include a strong emphasis on first-party data strategies in light of the impending deprecation of third-party cookies, which is set to occur in early 2025 [(Third-Party Cookie Delay: A Reprieve, Not a Respite for Marketers, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/blog/third-party-cookie-delay-a-reprieve-not-a-respite-for-marketers). Adswerve is actively helping clients adapt to these changes by providing resources and training on new attribution models and privacy-compliant marketing strategies [(A New Approach to Attribution: How Marketers Can Adapt, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/blog/a-new-approach-to-attribution-how-marketers-can-adapt).

## Employee Insights and Company Culture
Adswerve promotes a virtual-first workplace culture that values collaboration, diversity, and inclusion. The company emphasizes the importance of creating a welcoming environment for all employees, as articulated by CEO Roger Berdusco, who stated, "I've seen firsthand the difference that a strong commitment to DEI practices makes in an organization like ours" [(Join Us | Culture | Adswerve by Adswerve Inc, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/join-us/culture). The company offers competitive benefits, including medical, dental, and vision coverage, as well as professional development opportunities [(Join Us | Culture | Adswerve by Adswerve Inc, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/join-us/culture).

## Opinions about the Company
Adswerve has received positive feedback for its innovative approach to digital marketing and its commitment to client success. The company's ability to adapt to industry changes, such as the shift towards first-party data, has been highlighted as a key strength. Additionally, its partnerships with major platforms like Google and Adobe position it favorably within the competitive landscape of digital marketing consultancies [(Partners | Adswerve by Adswerve Inc, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/partners).

## Major Changes in the Company
The acquisition of MiaProva is a significant change for Adswerve, enhancing its capabilities in marketing technology and analytics. This move is part of a broader strategy to strengthen its service offerings and maintain its competitive edge in the rapidly evolving digital marketing landscape [(Adswerve Acquires MiaProva to Expand Digital Marketing Offerings and Enhance Testing Capabilities, 2024)](https://adswerve.com/press-releases/adswerve-acquires-miaprova-to-expand-digital-marketing-offerings-and-enhance-testing-capabilities).
